Header: Measurement and Mapping Institute at Diyathalawa will be converted into a Charted University
Content: Minister Bandula Gunawardena says that the Measurement and Mapping Institute at Diyathalawa will be converted within next 100 days into a Charted University. The Minister mentioned this following an observation tour of the institution. State Minister S.B. Dissanayake accompanied the Minister. Training has been given over a long period of time through the institute by the Department of Survey. Plans has been drawn up to conduct diploma courses at the institute for the students who will not be able to enter universities. Speaking on the occasion the Minister said that developing of human resources has become a main target after President Gotabaya Rajapaksa assumed office.
